TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EdmComplexPropertyAttribute extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmPropertyAttribute

Docs.summary: Attribute that indicates that the property represents a complex property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmComplexPropertyAttribute> links the complex property of a class to the complex property of an entity type or complex type defined in the conceptual model.
This attribute is applied to properties that return complex types.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
